MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the EH29, EH30, EH49 & EH52 postcode areas of Kirkliston, South Queensferry, Linlithgow & Broxburn. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:21pm. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to restore the remaining customers. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigations required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:15pm on Monday, 18 January 2021
